title: When the entirety of the Boards calls juggernauts and bruisers "tanks..."
body:
https://media.giphy.com/media/P7lozoYWQjppC/giphy.gif?noredirect

And anyone who actually enjoys this on a kinky level will line up afterwards for a follow-up slap to the face.

replies.body:
hum.. there is only one champion who get very close for being a tank in League.
that said champion is not a Tank, and he is half off the story, so he is not a champion.
that said, Mega gnar is very close to a tank.
there's other champions who are very close to a RPG tank, here's a list with a few off them:
{{champion:12}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:44}}

that said, every one know about they burst/bruiser builds.
so yeah, putting any champ in a class is quite stupid think to do, just like calling a very good rank player "high elo player" riot does use Elo system any-more, it use a system derived from the Elo system, get over with.
and that is why
{{champion:67}} can kill everything.
{{champion:31}} does know if take all that damage or no.
{{champion:17}} is a... is teemo.
{{champion:34}}  is a battle mage, a enchanter, is what?
{{champion:64}} does everything and a bit more, without big drawbacks.

in conclusion:
https://i0.wp.com/100happybirthdaymemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Funny-cat-meme.jpg

Welcome to Memes & Games.

Where I don't want to see shit like this.

But I do appreciate the effort you put into it.

Your half-assed googled memes fail to impress me.

SAMURAI
FOOOOOOOOOOL!
Khajiit is not amused.

^
I agree with melle

well, I have being catchup.
I do use google to search for something I remembered/thought about it.
that said, is not tea time, but I don't remember what time loop i am stuck in.
i don't remember the first time I tried to kill time...
and that's is from a book, you probably will not get it.
anyway, just so you know: you kill time, but it buries you.
sorry...
I think it's trying to communicate
it's a good point, but maybe it's just trying to make noise.
"it's just semantics"

You think this is a game?!?

No, this is war, son. Treat it like your life depends on it, boy.

WAR! Huh, yeah, what is it good for? Absolutely nothin'!

You can't trick me...
WAR IS WHAT WARTORTLE AND WARDS ARE MADE OF!
Nerf tanks Baron Nashor can 1v5 wtf

This full tank {{champion:240}} just one shot me.
{{item:3748}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3047}}
Well technically, his W can rip your HP to shreds in a matter of like, 3-4 autoattacks.

Here is a helpful chart for those who don't know what is what:

Damage: ----Skirmisher----Diver-------Juggernaut-------Vanguard----Warden----- :Tanky 
                  --------------------^--------------(Fighters)-----------------------------^--^------------(Tanks)------------^--------------

 https://arthurchow.files.wordpress.com/2012/01/arm-yourself-with-knowledge-logo.jpg

*paid for by the fighters are not tanks committee*
{{champion:36}} goes where he pleases

Here is a helpful chart for those who don't know what is what.

Damage:---Assassin----Skirmisher----Diver-------Juggernaut-------Vanguard----Warden----- :Tanky
-----------------^----------------(Slayers)---------^--------------(Fighters)---------^-------------(Tanks)------------^--------------

*paid for by the technicality commitee*
I wasn't going to put Skirmishers in there, but I had this horrible feeling people would have thought Skirmishers were Divers, so I added them.
There is a good chance that people will call divers assassins unless you have the whole thing as well.
http://68.media.tumblr.com/d4e2809601592342b451bc7647943dc6/tumblr_n2ma9qoXJp1rwzsbso2_500.gif
I mean mecha {{champion:72}} is pretty close to a tank
And then there's  {{champion:14}}, who _is_ actually a tank, but a bunch of uninformed fools insist on calling him a juggernaut!
[https://media.giphy.com/media/en9xyVUxAbwtO/giphy.gif](https://media.giphy.com/media/en9xyVUxAbwtO/giphy.gif)
Imagine if tanks were tanky

when someone tells you garen isn't a juggernaut, he is a tank.
https://media.giphy.com/media/cPKWZB2aaB3rO/giphy.gif
Can I get slapped somewhere else?
I'll box you in the ear, instead, ya little runt.
What if I ask really nicely?
{{champion:36}} wants to be a tank but people say no
